oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Its Memory Alone Remains Medal, detail
Fort Sanders, reunion medal
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Cast and stamped round metal disk with the words "Fort Sanders. Its Memory Alone Remains" around the edge and the image of a large hill with United States flag in the center. The disk is attached to a red, white, and blue silk ribbon hanging from a stamped metal bar pin.

Cast and stamped round metal disk with the words "Fort Sanders. Its Memory Alone Remains" around the edge and the image of a large hill with United States flag in the center. The disk is attached to a red, white, and blue silk ribbon hanging from a stamped metal bar pin.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Reunions; Fort Sanders (Knoxville, Tenn.)
The Persistence of Memory
